overview:
Tracy is in charge of the day-to-day operations at PlanGrid and is always driving the rest of the team to new levels of productivity and long hours. With the most field experience of the founding team, Tracy is responsible for the feature set and ease of use of PlanGrid. Tracy is always arguing for better functionality, clearer interfaces, and a better user experience for all of our customers.

Prior to founding PlanGrid, Tracy helped build hospitals for Rudolph and Sletten Construction. Tracy has a BS in Construction Management from Sacramento State University and is a damned fine painter on those rare occasions when she isnâ€™t working.
